heroSection.description: PayHere Referral Program allows you to earn an additional income by referring PayHere to your business networks & helping them to grow with PayHere.

steps.title: Join Program
description: Sign up to become a PayHere Referrer
Get a recommendation from an existing PayHere Merchant
Provide your bank account details to get rewarded

steps.title: Refer Friend
description: Spread the word about PayHere to your networks
Refer PayHere to businesses with online payment needs
Help your referred businesses to use PayHere

steps.title: Earn Points
description: Get your referrals confirmed once they become PayHere Merchants
Earn reward points for every payment they receive with PayHere
Redeem your reward points as cash
